name: Four Emperors Battle
description:
Explore fantastical sea realms, unleash amazing skills, collect your favorite ships and heroes. Define your own adventure. Set sail now!

===HD 3D characters, immersive sea worlds!
Realistic 3D rendering for all characters and skills to create a real sea voyage for you!

===Fair and exciting arena battles
Brave warriors always charge first! Diverse battle modes, unleash skills and combo hits to wreak havoc in the battlefield. Nakamas, the fight is on!


===Build the strongest crew!
Hundreds of characters to build your crew with. Recruit different crewmates to build different squads and strategize to win every battle!

[Tips]
